title: She is forced to work & must take off her niqab to pay off student loan, what to do? Assim al hakeem
transcript: muhammad from the uk he is saying that he and his wife took student loans now to pay off his wife's student loans they force her to work and take off the nikab and i ask him what happens if she doesn't work he says they have to pay it on installments then pay it on installments there's no justification none whatsoever for her to take off the nikab and the student loans to my knowledge that if you work and earn a certain threshold or above you're obliged to pay them back if not you are exempted from that
